mapper.select: SELECT b.*,r.content as answer,c.cus_id as cus_id FROM board as b INNER JOIN product as p on b.prod_no = p.id INNER JOIN seller as s on s.id = p.seller_no JOIN customer as c on c.id = b.cus_no LEFT JOIN reply as r on r.board_no=b.id WHERE s.id = #{seller_no} AND c.id = b.cus_no AND b.bname='question' AND b.is_del=0;
SELECT count(*) FROM board AS b LEFT JOIN reply AS r ON b.id = r.board_no LEFT JOIN product AS p ON p.id = b.prod_no WHERE r.board_no IS NULL AND b.bname = "question" AND p.seller_no = #{seller_no}
